localResource.name: Host_Type
localResource.label: Host_Type
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT v3_0_enum_translator_view.value, v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_key, 0 as sort FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view, v3_0_host_configuration_view WHERE v3_0_host_configuration_view.host_type = v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_key AND v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_type = 'HOST_TYPE' AND v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id in (SELECT v3_0_cluster_configuration_view.cluster_id FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view WHERE v3_0_cluster_configuration_view.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid)) AND v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id = CASE $P{P_Cluster_ID} WHEN '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' THEN v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id ELSE cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as uuid) END AND history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_host_configuration_view a GROUP BY a.host_id) AND create_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END AND (delete_date IS NULL OR (delete_date >= CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) AND delete_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END)) $P!{is_deleted} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT value, -1, 1 FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view WHERE enum_type = 'REPORTS_ALL' AND enum_key = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC, value
